name: Crystal Chip Collector
description: A fast puzzle platformer where the goal is to "optimize" a computer full of redundant parts.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Bad: a cat helps your computer & internet run faster by collecting crystals inside your PC  just like in real life.  Good: all the crystal you want without the tooth rot. bad skin, and soul eating addiction.  Uber alles: fun lil puzzle platformer with cats that can help slaughter some time for you.
